Demographics: 55,600,000 in United Kingdom (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 335,148,868. L2 users: 1,500,000 in United Kingdom (Crystal 2003). L2 users worldwide: 505,000,000.
60,000,000 in France (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 74,980,460.
1,630,000 in Serbia. Population total all countries: 3,486,100. Ethnic population: 2,000,000 (1998 Los Angeles Times).
